The '''Black Hand''' was a title of [[Morgoth]], used by [[Beleg]] to explain how Morgoth's power had expanded southwards [[Beleriand]] after the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]].<ref>{{S|Turin}}</ref>

In the [[Third Age]], [[Gollum]] twice applied the same epithet to [[Sauron]]'s left hand. Gollum mentioned how Sauron had just four fingers on his "black hand", this being of course due to the fact that [[Isildur]] had cut off the finger that bore the [[The One Ring|One Ring]].<ref>{{TT|IV3}}</ref>
